sentences.sContent: He used to train in a local park and mingle with other runners.
sentences.sContent_eng: He used to train in a local park and mingle with other runners.
sentences.sCn: 他过去常在地方公园里锻炼，并与其他跑步的人相交往。

sentences.sContent: In both types of surgery beauty and mental healing subtly mingle, he claims, and both benefit health.
sentences.sContent_eng: In both types of surgery beauty and mental healing subtly mingle, he claims, and both benefit health.
sentences.sCn: 所有的手术类型中，美和心灵治疗微妙地混合，他声称，都有益于健康。

remMethod.val: 铃铛声 (jingle) 混合 (mingle) 在一起形成噪音
